projects.title: MH-DDoS
projects.description: A customized version of the MH-DDoS tool originally developed by matrixTM, enhanced with a web-based user interface for easier interaction. This interface simplifies the configuration and execution of stress tests, making the tool more accessible for educational and testing purposes.

projects.title: Tech Blog
projects.description: A blog focused on web development, programming tips, and technology trends with a clean, minimalist design and rich content organization.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: An interactive weather application that provides real-time forecasts, historical data, and visualization tools using modern APIs and charting libraries.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: A fully-featured online store with product catalog, shopping cart, secure checkout, and user account management built with modern web technologies.

projects.title: Recipe Collection
projects.description: A culinary website featuring curated recipes, cooking tips, and meal planning tools with beautiful food photography and intuitive navigation.

projects.title: Task Manager
projects.description: A productivity application for organizing tasks, managing projects, and tracking progress with customizable workflows and collaboration features.
